Title: Tom Gets A Haircut

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to me is that the picture was duplicated and dubbed in other languages, like in many “silent” pictures. This leads to a loss of realism in the acting.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have found safe haven in Fantasy space. One day a female emigrant decides to return to the menace called Earth to see if her dish-washed might be alive. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little action and that the action it does have, is poorly shot and edited. However, the negative reviews are few and far between and are far greatly outnumbered by the many fans and collectors of this film. The Hate Me Now
